title: Proxy
description: Using the Proxy, you can configure your custom proxy into the postman for particular url

url.description: The Url for which the pariticular proxy needs to be taken care, Wild cards are also supported

protocol.description: The protocol of the proxy server connecting to

host.description: The host of the proxy server

port.description: The port to the proxy server

tunnel.description: This ensures whether the tunneling need to be done while applying the proxy
